allow: Bash(node -e "const fs = require(''fs''); const path = require(''path''); const cacheDir = path.join(''.'', ''node_modules'', ''.cache'', ''gh-pages''); if (fs.existsSync(cacheDir)) { fs.rmSync(cacheDir, { recursive: true, force: true }); console.log(''Cache cleared''); } else { console.log(''No cache found''); }")
